productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 286 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It vibrates noticeable when on a large wooden table. It gets warmer for my expectations and it does work flawless! What I don't understand is why there is no Toshiba label like in the Amazon picture. The label is like off brand, like I would print myself if not motivated to a better label. Kind of shocking but then again what do I care about the sort of a label, my worry is reliability, ability to read and transfer data with no mistakes. Windows 10 I use (x32 bit) is definitely not up to the task, though. Sometimes I think that Windows 10 is not the best to transfer data but the hard drive is flawless!!! I switched to win 10 x64 and had no problems at all, except for windows 10 being too over protective (good luck trying to disable the antivirus (successfully) on windows 10 x 64).Why does it vibrate? Motor, materials and the hard rubber standoffs. I put it into an Amazon enclosure and the vibration vanished (although the enclosure itself has problems with weak fan and rubber standoffs).I purchased a temp reader on Amazon to have a better understanding of operating temperature. With that type of disk size one must be vigilant but I never had a failed Toshiba drive yet and certainly don't expect it with this hard drive. Thank you Toshiba and Amazon!!!Incredible quality. Thank you Amazon and Amazon delivery person/system!!!!Jan 23 2024 I made few corrections to the text above, Windows 10 x64 works very well, that unswitchable sob antivirus keeps interacting, tried everything; the Toshiba hard drive is FLAWLESS (have I said FLAWLESS?). I purchased a 3.5" hard drive travel/storage case on Amazon and I am glad I did: while travelling, I kept praising myself for not being cheap and buying the protective case, the name is Orico, please look it up on Amazon, well worth the money even if you don't travel, for travellers it is an absolute must have. Again, Toshiba hard drives, all of them are the best quality, I have never (have I said already NEVER?) lost a Toshiba hard drive and have a whole tub of NotToBeMentionedByName hard drives, everything you can name is in that sorry tub-RIP, kept for historical purposes. Yes, you bet, I keep trying to advertise the Toshiba Hard drive, no matter what capacity; they do always work- have I said, FLAWLESS???

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Runs really quiet, good job Toshiba!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought 3, they work great! Be sure to initialize as GPT not MBR.
reviews.reviewText: NOTE: I've seen many people complain about drives because they're "fake" and only have 2048 GB. The drive is not fake. 2048GB is a limitation of the old MBR partition format, and if you initialize/format the drive with MBR you will see a 2TB partition! All you need to do to fix this is right click on the drive number in Windows Disk Management (get there from the start menu via Computer Management or "Create and format hard disk partitions"), click "Convert to GTP", and reformat the drive.I needed to replace several 6-year-old 6TB drives, and these were the natural choice. FC-MAMR is, of course, new tech, but I am expecting these to be reliable: a media that requires a stronger magnetic recording field means more energy is required to flip individual magnetic bits, so they should be less likely to flip on their own.Otherwise, the drives run exactly like you'd expect any other drive to run: plug it in and go. They aren't any noisier than any of my other drives and I have been transferring data to them non-stop since installation and haven't encountered any problems or unexpected behavior.Great job, Toshiba!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought two "new" 20TB, one had an Amazon Renewed insert, both had been installed before
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two new 20tb drives and one came with an Amazon Renewed insert. The price was great for new, and they probably aren't actually new which was why the price was great.Going to run tests, not certain if I'll keep them, but wanted others to be aware of what might be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Value for Price
reviews.reviewText: The drives are best value for price (even still as of writing date) on Amazon. I Installed two x 18TB drives into my NAS which was excellent for space but did come at an noticeable noise level increase. At first I was concerned that the noises the drives made meant some fault but I have ran 2 full scans on the drives and have found no errors. So far everything working good. The noises likely come from the drives themselves and the way the "Flux Control Microwave-assisted Magnetic Recording" tech works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible write speed
reviews.reviewText: The right speed is only 1/2 that, 125 Mb per second, of the 18 TB Eros. Absolutely awful! I purchased two and I'm returning them both right away. I have always had good luck with Toshiba in the past but this is absolutely mind-blowing. A premium price for a poorlyperforming product. I have no clue how they're going to be able to sell these. I'm off the Toshiba wagon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nothing to dislike. It's quiet, relatively fast, has tremendous storage capacity and the price is really affordable. Windows 10 detection is fast and installs easily.Motherboard, X570Ryzen 3600/5800X

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Interesting differences in SMART
reviews.reviewText: I'm new to Toshiba drives (have lots of Seagate and WD), but these drives lack a SMART conveyance test, which is the first thing I run when I get new drives to check for shipping damage. Instead, I ran the long test on them. Here's another difference. On Seagate/WD, while a long test is running, there's an entry in the test results stating that a test is ongoing, and what % is left. And if a drive loses power, when it gets power again, it'll resume the test where it left off. On these drives, there's no entry in the test results until the test completes, and if the drive loses power, it'll forget it was testing.Other than those quirks, SMART output shows that these drives are brand new with 0 hours and the long tests completed on them without issue. FYI, the polling time recommended for the long test results was 15xx minutes (25-26 hours), but the tests actually finished in about 22 hours.

Best deal I could find.Fast free shipping. Actually has a Canadian warranty -This is a Large bulk storage HD - so you should know how to install/mount/format it correctly.Would definitely buy again if I ever run low on storage again,

Mit mehreren Jahrzehnten Erfahrung habe ich immer mal wieder den Festplattenhersteller gewechselt. Mein Anspruch ist großer Stauraum und, weil es im Arbeitszimmer genutzt wird, weitgehende Geräuschlosigkeit. Meine bisherigen Favoritenhersteller haben bei diesen Kapazitäten Liederschwierigkeiten. So bin ich erstmalig zu Toshiba gewechselt. Die Platte ist im Ruhemodus nicht zu hören. Zugriffe können aus dem PC-Gehäuse nicht gehört werden. Die Platte vibriert auch nicht. Wird hier als Datensenke genutzt. Mal sehen wie lange die HDD hält. Die Geschwindigkeit ist für diese Plattengröße im Normalbereich und völlig ausreichend. ,,, und ... sie wurde tatsächlich in einem Luftpolster, ausreichend gesichert, geliefert. In der Vergangenheit immer mal wieder ein Problem bei Bestellungen gewesen. Hier alles Top!

Hdd de 20tb, me preocupaba el ruido que podía hacer, pero la verdad es que sin ser silencioso no hace mucho ruido, dentro de los límites de aceptable para mí. Por otro lado ha llegado muy bien protegido y envío rápido. Llegó dentro de una caja y dentro de la misma con gomaespuma y un blister de plástico, como se puede ver en la imagen

Un bon point : ce disque est arrivé avec plusieurs jours d’avance sur le calendrier annoncé, bien emballé et en bon état. — Immédiatement reconnu par Windows et formaté, ce disque de capacité enfin confortable est RAPIDE, avec à l’occasion des débits qui frôlent ou dépassent 200 Mo/seconde (jusqu’à 203 Mo/sec relevés) et sur de longues durées. — Par ailleurs, il ne chauffe pas excessivement, restant aux environs de 45° pendant un transfert important. Détail qui peut jouer sur sa longévité… — En somme, pleinement satisfait de mon achat.
